alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bradford, north central Alachua, northwestern Putnam, central Union and southwestern Clay Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 115 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Butler, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starke, Lake Butler, Keystone Heights, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Middleburg, Worthington Springs, Groves, Beasley and New River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Clay; Western Putnam
